text: The iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max are smartphones made by Apple Inc. They were started on September 20, 2019, as replacements to the iPhone X and X Max. The phones feature a third camera lens on the rear instead of two lenses. They are available in gold, silver, space gray, and a new midnight green shade. They ship with an 18-watt power adapter and a USB-C–to–Lightning cable for fast charging. == Related pages == *iPhone 11 == References == == Notes == == Other websites == * 11 Pro Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2019 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording
title: IPhone 11 Pro
